tool_description: Get accurate historical weather from over 104,000 locations around the world. Daily weather measurements from 1763! Weather information includes: minimum & maximum daily temperature, snow fall, precipitation, evaporation and more!
name: Global Weather History
title: Global Weather History

api_list.name: Weather
api_list.description: Get historic weather for a location.

optional_parameters.name: max_dist
optional_parameters.description: Max allowed distance of measurement station from supplied location. Default: 100,000 m.

optional_parameters.name: include
optional_parameters.description: Only gets specific measurements. Supported values: TMAX (max temperature, C), TMIN (minimum temperature, C) PRCP (precipitation, tenth of mm), SNOW (snowfall, mm), SNWD (snow depth, mm). For multiple parameters, separate with comma (TMIN,TMAX). Default: all.
